quote_first: Ruth finally walked through the door at
quote_last:
“Any messages?” she asked the receptionist.
“No,” replied the girl, “but there is a lady waiting to see you.”
title: False Impression
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: As Stone Aimes stepped off the elevator on the sixth floor, his mind was running through his options. This phone call had to be about Winston Bartlett. He was going to step up the pressure.
title: Syndrome
author: Thomas Hoover
